Introduction¶

roipy is a set of python classes and modules for working with ROI_PAC data. ROI_PAC is open source processing code for InSAR.

Getting Started¶

Basic usage involves importing roipy (preferrably from iPython)

$ import roipy as rp

Then rp. tab complete to get an idea of what you can do
